name: agenc-task-completion-circuit
description: AgenC task completion ZK circuit for groth16-solana

scripts.witness: snarkjs wtns calculate target/circuit_js/circuit.wasm input.example.json target/witness.wtns
scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup target/circuit.r1cs pot14_final.ptau target/circuit.zkey
scripts.export-vk: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey target/circuit.zkey target/verification_key.json
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run export-vk
